thread.title: Neon Indian Shares The Glitzy Hive
thread.title_full: Neon Indian Shares The Glitzy Hive - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Neon Indian Shares The Glitzy Hive
text:
Today on Beats 1, Zane Lowe debuted a new song from Neon Indian's new album VEGA INTL. Night School (out October 16 via Mom and Pop/Transgressive). Check out "The Glitzy Hive" below.
Neon Indian will also perform on "The Tonight Show With Jimmy Fallon" on Monday, October 12.
Alan Palomo recently teased that his previously shared single "Slumlord" is getting a new music video soon. Check out a few photos from the set below.
A photo posted by Neon Indian (@alan_palomo) onOct 5, 2015 at 10:45pm PDT
A photo posted by Neon Indian (@alan_palomo) onOct 6, 2015 at 3:19am PDT
A photo posted by Neon Indian (@alan_palomo) onOct 7, 2015 at 8:02am PDT
Watch Neon Indian perform "Hex Girlfriend" on Pitchfork.tv's "+1": Â»
